title: Mother Teresa Hall of Residence
content: Mother Teresa Hall of Residence, also known as "MT Hall," is one of the halls of residence for female students at IIT Kharagpur. It has 5 blocks and is situated at Nalini Ranjan Sarkar Avenue, IIT Kharagpur, West Medinipur, Kharagpur, West Bengal 721302. It has a capacity of Total Students of 450 students.
Hall Warden: Prof. Mamoni Banerjee, Rajendra Mishra School of Engineering Entrepreneurship
Assistant wardens: Prof. Amrita Sen and Prof. Balraj Kaur Sidhu
Prof. Amrita Sen (Mess) Prof. Balraj K. Sidhu (Maintenance)
GSec Socult: Sudarshana Jaiswal, Snehashri P G
GSecÂ Mess: Preeti Nilanjana, Yaram Ektha Suhitha
